account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: The Facebook Ad account ID to use when pulling data from the Facebook Marketing API.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: The value of the access token generated. See the docs for more information

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for AdCreatives and AdInsights APIs, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

include_deleted.title: Include Deleted
include_deleted.description: Include data from deleted campaigns, ads, and adsets.

insights_lookback_window.title: Insights Lookback Window
insights_lookback_window.description: The attribution window for the actions

insights_days_per_job.title: Insights Days Per Job
insights_days_per_job.description: Number of days to sync in one job. The more data you have - the smaller you want this parameter to be.
